You see this is why Hobi is my second Bias 😍💜  His personality is neverending and he can handle even the most evil person on earth (perfect example being little Brat Jungkook and his fella Park Chim Chim, featuring Taehyung)  Also Hobi is very classy and fine man so there's no need to deny that he has great personality and whatsoever the best manners in BTS in Facct  Also he's always so happy to dance so if you ever meet him just start dancing because I'm pretty sure that's the way he talks with someone :D jk  Also there was this video where BTS got bit drunk on camera and when they were drinking Hobi was all cheerful and fun but when he got tipsy he literally went from 100 to 0 and looked sad af like he didn't wanted to put up with this CrAp anymore :D  But so on he has to be pretty nice personality for real cause I really do think that he shows it very well by what he's doing and making everyone happy :) 💜 ✌️ so there you go  Also this Pic hurts my feelings cause Joon is my first Bias 😢😭❤️💜❤️ and they both look so fine I would literally jump into the vulcano for them
